alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 7:23PM CDT until September 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Montgomery County in southwestern Iowa... Northeastern Page County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 722 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Red Oak, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Stanton around 740 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Villisca. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
